titles.title: A bill to provide private relief.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/20/2006--Introduced. Makes the survivors of Christopher Kangas of Brookhaven, Pennsylvania, eligible for a specified monetary award to be issued by the Bureau of Justice Assistance of the Department of Justice due to his death as a result of his acting in the capacity of a public safety officer. Directs the United States Fire Administration to include the name of Christopher Kangas on the National Fallen Firefighters Memorial in Emmitsburg, Maryland.
